mapper.select: select uid, project_name as projectName, start_dt as startDt, end_dt as endDt, start_predict_dt as startPredictDt, end_predict_dt as endPredictDt, project_state_code as stateCode from project where project_name like concat('%',#{projectName},'%')

select uid, project_name as projectName, start_dt as startDt, end_dt as endDt, start_predict_dt as startPredictDt, end_predict_dt as endPredictDt, project_state_code as stateCode from project where project_name like concat('%',#{projectName},'%') and project_state_code = #{stateCode}
mapper.insert: insert into project(project_name, start_dt, end_dt, start_predict_dt, end_predict_dt, project_state_code, first_update_pn, last_update_pn) values (#{project.projectName}, #{project.startPredictDt}, #{project.endPredictDt}, #{project.startPredictDt}, #{project.endPredictDt}, #{project.stateCode}, #{loginUserPn}, #{loginUserPn})
mapper.update: update project set project_name = #{project.projectName}, start_dt = #{project.startDt}, end_dt = #{project.endDt}, start_predict_dt = #{project.startPredictDt}, end_predict_dt = #{project.endPredictDt}, project_state_code = #{project.stateCode}, last_update_pn = #{loginUserPn}, last_update_dt = current_timestamp where uid = #{project.uid}
